パッケージ org.sxb.kit

SXB预置工具类包
已经包含当今非常流行的工具,请尽量优先使用此包中的工具

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースの概要 
    インタフェース 説明
    ErrorHandler
    A strategy for handling errors.
    MultiValueMap<K,V>
    Extension of the Map interface that stores multiple values.
    ReflectionKits.FieldCallback
    Callback interface invoked on each field in the hierarchy.
    ReflectionKits.FieldFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter fields to be operated on by a field callback.
    ReflectionKits.MethodCallback
    Action to take on each method.
    ReflectionKits.MethodFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter methods to be operated on by a method callback.
  • クラスの概要 
    クラス 説明
    AbstractComparator<T>
    半角文字の比較用クラスです。
    Assert
    Assertion utility class that assists in validating arguments.
    Checker
    Created by jeffson on 14-12-29.
    ClassKits
    Miscellaneous class utility methods.
    ClassSearcher  
    CollectionKits
    Miscellaneous collection utility methods.
    ConcurrencyThrottleSupport
    Support class for throttling concurrent access to a specific resource.
    DigestKits
    Miscellaneous methods for calculating digests.
    FileKit
    FileKit.
    HandlerKit
    控制器工具类 HandlerKit.
    HashKit
    Hash tools
    HttpKit
    HttpKit 外部HTTP服务访问类 此类仅经过轻微封装，采用Java 原生态方式，以期效率更快
    ImageKit
    重新设计开源组件 未完成
    Joiner
    字符串连接工具类 当字符串连接中间需要分隔符时 Created by son on 14-12-29.
    Joiner.MapJoiner
    An object that joins map entries in the same manner as Joiner joins iterables and arrays.
    JsonKit
    Convert object to json string.
    LinkedCaseInsensitiveMap<V>
    key键 不区分大小写Map类 LinkedHashMap variant that stores String keys in a case-insensitive manner, for example for key-based access in a results table.
    LinkedMultiValueMap<K,V>
    多值映射Map
    K: key
    V: value Type: List
    Simple implementation of MultiValueMap that wraps a LinkedHashMap, storing multiple values in a LinkedList.
    Lister
    定时任务处理用 Created by son on 14-12-29.
    Maper
    定时任务处理用 Map类 QuartzJob Created by son on 14-12-29.
    NumberUtils
    Miscellaneous utility methods for number conversion and parsing.
    ObjectKits
    Miscellaneous object utility methods.
    PathKit
    new File("..
    Prop
    属性资源 Prop.
    PropKit
    属性资源读取类 PropKit.
    RandomStringKit
    Operations for random Strings.
    Reflect
    类映射工具类 A wrapper for an Object or Class upon which reflective calls can be made.
    ReflectionKits
    Simple utility class for working with the reflection API and handling reflection exceptions.
    StreamKits
    Simple utility methods for dealing with streams.
    StringKits
    Miscellaneous String utility methods.
    StrKit
    StrKit.
    WebKits
    Miscellaneous utilities for web applications.
  • 例外の概要 
    例外 説明
    ReflectException
    A unchecked wrapper for any of Java's checked reflection exceptions: These exceptions are ClassNotFoundException IllegalAccessException IllegalArgumentException InstantiationException InvocationTargetException NoSuchMethodException NoSuchFieldException SecurityException

パッケージorg.sxb.kitの説明

SXB预置工具类包
已经包含当今非常流行的工具,请尽量优先使用此包中的工具
作成者:
Jeffson
